name: Frontier
description: Create your own story amidst the dusty wastelands of the Wild West. Found cities, become a master hunter, or create your own mansion... experience the Frontier how it was supposed to be- with the power to transform it sitting at your fingertips!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (Will Work With Older Versions But Not Recommended) Processor: 2GHz Dual-Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 1GB GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Onboard, No Additional Sound Card Required
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8/10 Processor: 3.5GHz+ CPU Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 2GB+ GPU DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: PCIe Sound Card For Extra Gaming Immersion Additional Notes: Can Ran Smoothly With Max Settings
